8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Qatadah narrated that :the Prophet said: "Fast the Day of Arafah, for indeed I anticipate that Allah will forgive (the sins) of the year after it, and the year before it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ صَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue OF Fasting On The Day of Arafah
